alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 8:14PM CDT until July 09 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Beauregard Parish in southwestern Louisiana... South central Vernon Parish in west central Louisiana... Northwestern Allen Parish in southwestern Louisiana... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 814 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near De Ridder, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... De Ridder, Dry Creek, Mittie, Sugartown, Grant and Bundick Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
